verses.name: Acts 14:23
verses.text: And when they had ordained them elders in every church, and had prayed with fasting, they commended them to the Lord, on whom they believed.

verses.name: Acts 14:24
verses.text: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia, they came to Pamphylia.

verses.name: Acts 14:25
verses.text: And when they had preached the word in Perga, they went down into Attalia:

verses.name: Acts 14:26
verses.text: And thence sailed to Antioch, from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled.
